medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever to 101Â°F and cloudy urine suggesting UTI.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was found to have fever and dusky appearance at 10 AM. Symptoms of cloudy urine with sediment persisted for the last 10 days, indicating a possible UTI. Notable new congestion and cough developed from the previous day. At baseline health and mental status was observed yesterday at a party.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple meningiomas s/p resections and XRT; R temporal lobe astrocytoma s/p resection; L cerebellar infarct; recurrent UTIs with chronic Texas cath in place; seizure disorder on Keppra; history of pulmonary embolism; hypertension; left thyroid nodule; G tube placement.
medical_history.family_history: Mother has breast cancer; father had heart disease, hypertension, arrhythmia, macular degeneration, prostate cancer, type 2 diabetes.
